name: Can i eat you?
description:
Play as a Monster that consumes Lizards to become Stronger!

Our Initial idea for the game was that you'd eat/consume different things to gain different abilities and you'd use them to pass levels and kill enemies easier. 
But, we didn't have time make all of that so we only have 1 enemy to eat and 1 ability to gain.

Unfortunately the game is unfinished but it is at least Playable (hopefully)!

Eat-em-up!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Eat/Attack: Left Mouse Button
  • Blow Fire: SPACE (you need to also eat a lizard)

Credits:

Lehip: Programming & Sound Design (itch name Draxhtar)
Jobius: Art & Animation (https://www.instagram.com/jmdeleeuw/)
